extDescription.message: A Chrome extension to help users focus on reading long articles by adding dividers and sticky notes

addDivider.description: Button text for adding a divider

addReadingCard.description: Button text for adding a reading card

addNote.description: Button text for adding a sticky note

instructionDrag.message: All elements can be dragged to adjust position

instructionDelete.message: Hover over elements to see delete button (top right)

instructionResize.message: Drag corner dots to resize elements

instructionNoteInput.message: Sticky notes can have multi-line text

errorUnsupported.message: FocusCut cannot work on this page.

errorUseOnRegular.message: Please use this extension on regular web pages.
errorUseOnRegular.description: Additional error message for unsupported pages

sponsorMessage.message:
